snippet: Leaders in East Flatbush are pleading for calm a day after a vigil for Kimani Gray turned chaotic, the most sustained turmoil in three consecutive days of protests.
abstract: Community leaders in East Flatbush section of Brooklyn plead for calm after a vigil for teenager Kimani Gray, fatally shot by police who say he pointed a weapon at them, turns chaotic; dozens of marchers are arrested and two police officers are hurt in most sustained unrest in three consecutive days of vigils and marches.
lead_paragraph: Leaders in East Flatbush are pleading for calm a day after a vigil for Kimani Gray turned chaotic, the most sustained turmoil in three consecutive days of protests.

headline.seo: Outsiders Faulted for Turmoil in East Flatbush After Police Kill Teenager
headline.main: Outsiders Faulted for Unrest in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Outsiders Faulted for Unrest in Brooklyn
